thread.title: ​‘Jinde meriye’ from ‘Qissa Panjab’: Nooran sisters create magic
thread.title_full: ​‘Jinde meriye’ from ‘Qissa Panjab’: Nooran sisters create magic - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: ​‘Jinde meriye’ from ‘Qissa Panjab’: Nooran sisters create magic
text:
Punjabi film, Qissa Panjab has been making headlines for its bold content. The film, directed by Jatinder Mauhar, is also being appreciated for its music.
'Jinde meriye' is one of the special songs from the album, which has been rendered by the Nooran Sisters. Written by Manpreet Sidhu and composed by Gurmoh, the song is heart-wrenching and the Nooran sisters have infused soul into it.
Qissa Panjab stars Preet Bhullar, Dheeraj Kumar, Kul Sidhu, Jagjeet Sandhu, Aman Dhaliwal and Harashjot Kaur in lead roles and will release on October 16, 2015.
Source: Simplybhangra.com
